ðŸ“– Summary: Magnitude is an open-source, vision-first browser agent that uses AI to enable control of browsers with natural language. It allows users to navigate, interact with, and extract data from web interfaces, and includes a built-in test runner. It can be used for automating tasks, integrating apps, extracting data, and testing web apps.
